xmlText.p: First Period_1, Columbus, Panarin 18 (Jones, Atkinson), 5:31 (pp). 2, Washington, Ovechkin 39 (Carlson, Oshie), 6:57 (pp). 3, Columbus, Milano 9 (Jones, Wennberg), 7:53. 4, Columbus, Letestu 9 (Calvert, Sedlak), 14:32. 5, Columbus, Jones 9 (Panarin, Atkinson), 18:17 (pp). Penalties_Orlov, WSH, (holding), 5:17; Murray, CBJ, (slashing), 6:54; Backstrom, WSH, (hooking), 9:24; Orpik, WSH, (interference), 17:35; Wilson, WSH, (roughing), 20:00; Calvert, CBJ, served by Milano, Misconduct (misconduct), 20:00.
Third Period_6, Columbus, Atkinson 12, 17:18 (sh). Penalties_Anderson, CBJ, (cross checking), 15:39.
Goalies_Washington, Holtby 28-14-4 (16 shots-12 saves), Grubauer 7-7-3 (18-18). Columbus, Bobrovsky 27-20-5 (26-25).
Referees_Kevin Pollock, Kyle Rehman. Linesmen_David Brisebois, Lonnie Cameron.
